mods.abstract: Brothers George Carney (L) and Jerome Wegener (R) discussed scientific equipment. In his years at Christian Brothers College, Brother George taught physics, served as chair of the Physics Department and as Assistant Dean of Students. Brother Jerome also taught physics, as well as computer science, and served as the director of the Memphis/Shelby County Science Fair for many years.
